sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Potential missing input validation if size parameter is not checked

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Input parameters for source and destination memory addresses are not validated, leading to potential buffer overflows.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Directly operates on memory addresses without ensuring a deep copy, risking unintended data sharing or corruption.
